column4: guys got a quick question, can one upgrade from one release to the next with apt ?
no it just that i met a guy in Yahoo Chat a while ago with 'caveman' as his user
make that NQLD then :P lol.. kicked bulldogs ass last week
yeah i've used a few distros none compare to Ubuntu for sure
yeah, I am happy with my current setup, however its just too much of a pain in the ass to get off the ground.
i found the Ubuntu installer piss easy
it was like heaven on an installer lol except it had no graphical.. that was the only downside
its excellent just got adsl enabled in my exchange the other day. they are fast reliable and the customer support is great
and the best thing is the unmetered content.. it has a mirror for ubuntu.. so all my updates and everything are UNMETERED :) lol
